title: Fertilizer Optimizer
description: Find the right fertilizer mix for your field
errorMessage: Please fill in all required fields.
aboutContent: Fertilizer Optimizer is a tool that helps farmers calculate the right fertilizer mix based on their crop, soil type, and field size. This tool can help you optimize your crop yield.
instructionsStep1: 1. Enter your crop type (e.g., wheat, rice, corn)
instructionsStep2: 2. Enter your soil type (e.g., loamy, clay, sandy)
instructionsStep3: 3. Enter your field area in hectares
instructionsStep5: 5. View the recommended fertilizer mix results
disclaimer: Disclaimer: This tool is for general guidance only. Please consult a local agricultural expert for accurate fertilizer recommendations.
feedbackPrompt: Do you have any feedback or suggestions?
name: Name
